#summary Planned, additional Utilities

===Resume===
_Resumes (if currently paused (enabled == false?) iTweens (since iTween (JS) now operates in Update/FixedUpdate a simple deactivation of the script will pause the application of the iTween)

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.resumeAll();
 *iTween.resume(gameObject);
 *iTween.resume(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.resumeChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.resumeChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)

<hr>

===Pause===
_Pauses iTweens (since iTween (JS) now operates in Update/FixedUpdate a simple deactivation of the script will pause the application of the iTween)

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.pauseAll();
 *iTween.pause(gameObject);
 *iTween.pause(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.pauseChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.pauseChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)

<hr>

===Cancel===
_Stops and destroys iTweens AND reverts GameObjects to their original pre-tweened state._

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.cancelAll();
 *iTween.cancel(gameObject);
 *iTween.cancel(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.cancelChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.cancelChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)

<hr>

===Stop===
_Stops and destroys iTweens_

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.stopAll();
 *iTween.stop(gameObject);
 *iTween.stop(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.stopChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.stopChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)


<hr>

===Complete===
_Stops, destroys and instantly fast-forwards iTweens to their destination_

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.completeAll();
 *iTween.complete(gameObject);
 *iTween.complete(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.completeChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.completeChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)

<hr>

===Count===
_Returns an int of iTweens_

*Flavors:*
 *iTween.countAll();
 *iTween.count(gameObject);
 *iTween.count(gameObject,type);
 *iTween.countChildren(gameObject); (root inclusive)
 *iTween.countChildren(gameObject,type); (root inclusive)
